org.tros.torgo

Class ControllerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tros.torgo.ControllerBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogoController

    public abstract class ControllerBase
extends Object
implements Controller
    The main application. Controls GUI and interpreting process.
    Author:
    matta

      • createCanvas

        protected abstract TorgoScreen createCanvas(TorgoTextConsole console)
        Get a canvas for drawing to the screen. This can be null. If this is null, the canvas portion of the window will not be loaded.
        Parameters:
        console - the console component for user I/O.
        Returns:
        a screen.
